synopsis:
My Little Pony the Movie follows the alicorn Twilight Sparkle, her five pony friends – collectively known as the "Mane 6" – and her dragon friend Spike embarking on a quest to save their home of Equestria from an evil conqueror while gaining new friends in the process.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title.jp: My Little Pony: ~ Tomodachi wa Mahou ~ The Movie
